name: Skilled Hireling
description: A skilled hireling has proficiency in a specific tool or skill, such as a scribe, navigator, healer, or craftsperson. They perform their trade competently but are not combatants and will flee from danger unless given strong reason to stay.
capabilities: Proficient in one tool or skill
Can perform skilled labor (crafting, scribing, translating, navigating)
Follows reasonable instructions within their area of expertise

examples.description: Copies documents, takes notes, translates languages
Guides sea or overland travel, reads maps and charts
Stabilizes the dying, treats diseases and injuries with mundane methods
Repairs metal equipment, crafts simple metal goods
Prepares meals that can provide a bonus during short rests
